Text: you know what we REALLY want though? to be able to see the bonus material from the episodes, no matter how trivial or similar they might look to the actual episode. I mean in the end the episodes get uploaded but NEVER the extra content. please friend you are the only one who can help...

are you talking about the bonus scenes that are shown on the logotv website?

Rainbow
Can you tell me how you joined the files up together?
yes rainbow that's what I'm talking about. Please guys someone upload them and you'll be amazed how many users will download them. It's unfair that only american's can view them. PLEASE do it for us
Thank you SO MUCH for this!!!
